name: Slippery Surprise
description:
Oh no! Kek ate the whole cheese again! Help the couple catch him before he turns their house into a public restroom!

This is a 3 player game, in which each player randomly plays either as Kek (The dog), the cleaner or the catcher.

-------CONTROLS-------

You can choose to play with 1 -3 Joysticks or a keyboard. You can even play with 1 joystick and 2 keyboard slots!
